description:
MAJOR UPDATE!

Thanks to everyone for your feedback. We’ve listened and updated gameplay and instructions, and made several bug fixes.

NEW FEATURES

• Train in the gym with 3 brand-new mini games!
• Training levels up your stats to help you master the toughest spider fights.
• PUNCH FOR STRENGTH– build up your strength on the heavy.
• RUN FOR SPEED– hit the treadmill and increase your speed.
• JUMP FOR STAMINA– give the jump rope a whirl to raise your stamina.
• Master the spiders – get 3 stars on each spider by winning the match, winning the match with at least 50% health, and winning with a combo.
• New Game Center achievements and leaderboards.

They may look like your average spiders, but these have super strength and can’t wait to take you down.  Think you can beat them?  Inspired by the famous Mentos Rainbow Spider commercial, this game allows you to exact revenge on these ferocious arachnids. 

It’s your thumbs against their eight legs in a fight to the finish!

From veteran Game Designer Graeme Devine, lead designer of 7th Guest, 11th Hour, Quake III and Halo Wars. 

Fight your way through the six classes of these mini beasts and compete for status in Game Center. Super addictive gameplay.  

• Six realistic spiders, each more difficult. 

• Super-real environments, even under the bed!

• Game Center support. 

• Press and hold to get your dukes up!

• Swipe to attack! 

• Use combo moves! 

• Watch your health and stamina.

• Crowd noises react to your fight. 

• Totally free! 

BONUS — BEAT THE 1st SPIDER AND GET A COUPON FOR A FREE ROLL OF MENTOS WITH PURCHASE! Install the free app from Mentos now!
releaseNotes: Pruned down the hardness on the training games a little bit and fixed a few other bugs.
